snippet.title: RADIOLIGHT - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Radiolight is a riveting thriller about strange happenings in the town of Ashwood Creek. Play as Daniel, an ex-police officer, who has to fight the supernatural and himself when his family's and friends' lives are on the line.
Explore the town's forests as you talk through your radio and untangle the mystery hidden in your past.

More at http://radiolightgame.com/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342690/Radiolight/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/krystofknesl
